fields.services_text: Tip of the Tongue prides itself in understanding the expectations and needs of their clients based on 10 years’ experience manufacturing and distributing promotional products.
fields.contact_text: We are a full service design agency from the heart of Cape Town. We create perfect brands, vibrant identities, outstanding websites and creative concepts.
fields.subtitle: Bespoke Corporate Clothing & Branding
fields.title: From The Heart of Cape Town
fields.about_title: Make Your Brand Tip of Mind
fields.contact_location: 172 Victoria Road, Dewaal House, 3rd Floor, Cape Town, Western Cape, South Africa, 8000
fields.portfolio_text: We are a full service design agency from the heart of Cape Town. We create perfect brands, vibrant identities, outstanding websites and creative concepts.
fields.team_text: We are a full service design agency from the heart of Cape Town. We create perfect brands, vibrant identities, outstanding websites and creative concepts.
fields.about_paragraph: We can improve and elevate your brand touch point communication through the high quality of bespoke clothing and promotional products.
fields.about_subtitle: We Manufacturer & Streamline Bespoke Corporate Clothing
